messages.tl: Ninth level (post)

messages.zh: 是的，他们不知道自己被浮士德跟踪。
messages.tl: Yes, they don't know that they are being tracked by Faust.

messages.zh: 罗德岛被困在了下城区。
messages.tl: Rhodes Island was trapped in the Lower Town.

messages.zh: 虽然是些虫子，但他们可能趁着天灾降临而逃跑。
messages.tl: Although they are bugs, they may flee in the face of natural disasters.
Plus the loss of the key...

messages.zh: 以他们对切尔诺伯格的了解，说不定会干扰到我们的计划。
messages.tl: With their knowledge of Chernobyl, it may interfere with our plans.

messages.zh: 敌人没有停止攻击与前往避难的迹象！！
messages.tl: The enemy did not stop the attack and signs of refuge! !

messages.zh: 简直就像是......前仆后继的送死！！！
messages.tl: It’s like...the servant is dead! ! !
Are the Reunion Movement all crazy? !

messages.zh: 这就是罗德岛？呵......很英勇。
messages.tl: This is Rhodes Island? Oh... very heroic.
cut--

messages.zh: 整合运动是要拖我们一起下水吗！！
messages.tl: Reunion Movement is to drag us into the water! !
Just some fanatics -
There is no rule in fighting!
- Want to drag us with cannon fodder? !
The defensive position can't support it! !
... falling rocks?

messages.zh: 不对......是砸在建筑物上迸溅出来的......
messages.tl: No... it’s smashing on the building...

messages.zh: 糟了！该死，该死，该死——可恶！！
messages.tl: Oops! Damn, damn, damn - hateful! !
The natural disaster is coming! ! Prepare for protection! !
----How to do?
If they can survive the natural disasters -

messages.zh: 去吧。拦住他们中想逃的。
messages.tl: Go ahead. Stop them and want to escape.

messages.zh: 看看他们能拼命到什么程度。
messages.tl: See how far they can desperately.
That's too late! !
Ah...ah...
That is......
Sober!
Ready... Respond to natural disasters! !
